system.description: Like ebbing water, you are able to quickly adapt your lies and deceptions during the flow of conversation. You gain proficiency in Deception. If you are already proficient, you instead gain an expertise die. Additionally, if you fail a Deception check made to tell a lie to a creature, you can instantly reroll, but you must take the second result even if it is worse, as you notice they aren’t falling for your lies and quickly adapt. Once you use this ability on a creature, you cannot use it again on the same creature until you complete a long rest.
